data.title: How do they get cars for movies and shows based in the 80s or early 1900s? Are there warehouses filled with old cars, and how are they se...
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 6): There are some warehouses with old cars, but not enough for movies. Producers use a variety of methods to get old cars.
